channel.title: RPG Stuff on Strat
channel.description: Recent content in RPG Stuff on Strat

item.title: Paranoia - One-Shot 1
item.description: Here’s the notes I prepped for my first Paranoia one-shot I GMed. I’ve been reading up and thinking about Old School Renaissance RPG systems and settings for a few weeks and you can see the influence of that here.

item.title: RPG Icons
item.description: A more easily searchable bunch of icons to use with a VTT (probably https://www.owlbear.rodeo/) when I’m GMing.

item.title: X-Mooks GM Guide
item.description: Here’s some notes on GMing and helpful rollable tables to help with GMing.

item.title: X-Mooks Setting
item.description: Here’s some notes on the default setting X-Mooks, Golgea.
